english.segment1: Seek and you will find, they say. but I've been looking everyday. for a way past this wall that's in front of my face. I'm on hands and knees searching for my faith.
english.segment2: I know there's so much at stake. but I don't know if I can take one more pat on the back saying I'll be okay. Can't you see me whole life is in disarray?
english.segment4: I know You hear me, Would You give me a sign?. Reel me in before I've fallen in line. You've put me on a path I don't understand. I'm standing on a ledge waving my hands.
english.segment5: You've got me desperate (do You see me?). Desperate (do You hear me?). Desperate (will You help me?). You've got me desperate.
english.segment6: I know You're my only hope. The only One who truly knows how it feels, what it's like when it all starts to fall. You're the One I can trust who hears when I call.

english.segment10: Some things I'll never figure out. Until I let hope erase my doubt.
